00023 const double pi = 3.141592653589793238;
00024

00030 template<std::size_t n>
00031 class QperpGenerator3
00032 {
00033 private:
00034   double qmax;
00035   double mu2;
00036   boost::array<double, TPower<2,n>::value> weights;
00037 public:
00038   QperpGenerator3();
00039   void SetParameters( double temp, double energy, double mu );
00040   //void GetQsThetas( boost::array<double, 3*n>& randoms, boost::array<double, n>& Qs,
00041   void GetQsThetas( boost::array<double, 2*n>& randoms, boost::array<double, n>& Qs,
00042     boost::array<double, n>& Thetas );
00043   double GetQsEventWeight( long zeroes ) const;
00044 };
00045 
00046 template<std::size_t n>
00047 QperpGenerator3<n>::QperpGenerator3()
00048 {
00049 
00050 }
00051 
00052 template<std::size_t n>
00053 void QperpGenerator3<n>::SetParameters( double temp, double energy, double mu )
00054 {
00055   qmax = sqrt( 6. * temp * energy );
00056   mu2 = mu*mu;
00057 }
00058 
00059 template<std::size_t n>
00060 //void QperpGenerator3<n>::GetQsThetas( boost::array<double, 3*n>& randoms, 
00061 void QperpGenerator3<n>::GetQsThetas( boost::array<double, 2*n>& randoms, 
00062   boost::array<double, n>& Qs, boost::array<double, n>& Thetas )
00063 {
00064   for ( std::size_t i=0; i<n; ++i )
00065   {
00066     //Qs[i] = randoms[n+i]*qmax;
00067     //Thetas[i] = randoms[2*n+i]*2.*pi;
00068     Qs[i] = randoms[i]*qmax;
00069     Thetas[i] = randoms[n+i]*2.*pi;
00070   }
00071 
00072   boost::array<double, n> qweights;
00073   for ( std::size_t i=0; i<n; ++i )
00074   {
00075     qweights[i] = 2.*Qs[i] * mu2 / pow( Qs[i]*Qs[i] + mu2, 2 );
00076     qweights[i] *= qmax;
00077   }
00078 
00079   std::vector<bool> _isZeroed(n);
00080   for ( long j=0; j< TPower<2,n>::value; ++j )
00081   {
00082     weights[j] = 1.;
00083     SwUtils::_NumberToBoolArray( j, _isZeroed, n );
00084     for ( std::size_t i=0; i<n; ++i )
00085     {
00086       if ( !_isZeroed[i] )
00087         weights[j] *= qweights[i];
00088       else
00089         weights[j] *= -1.;
00090     }
00091   }
00092 }
00093 
00094 template<std::size_t n>
00095 double QperpGenerator3<n>::GetQsEventWeight( long zeroes ) const
00096 {
00097   return weights[zeroes];
00098 }
